articles.title: Moto G200 hits AnTuTu leaderboard with a high score disguised as the Moto Edge 30S - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: The Moto G200 has achieved an impressive AnTuTu score, having been tested as the Moto Edge 30S, its Chinese sibling. Motorola's latest budget flagship scored nearly 860,000 points, despite only costing €449.99 in Europe.
